resources.string: Welcome to Kings Castle Tower Defence. This short tutorial should help you learn how to play this game.
The objective of this game is to stop the invading monsters from making it from their spawn location to the objective.
To stop them you must build soldiers and towers.
You build buildings by pressing the build buildings button in the lower right hand corner of the screen.
Pressing the question mark in the corner of the building buttons will give you a short description of the building
